dc.title: Homepage | Representative Wally Herger 2nd District of California
dc.description: Wally Herger Representing the 2nd District of California, In November 2004, Wally Herger was reelected to his 10th term as a member of the House of Representatives from the Second Congressional District in Northern California. As a member of the tax writing, Committee on Ways and Means, Congressman Herger serves on the Subcommittee on Trade and is the chairman of the Subcommittee on Human Resources.
